tool_description: Determines optimal harvest timing based on plant maturity indicators, weather conditions, and quality factors.

weather_forecast_days.description: Days of weather forecast to consider (1-14)

harvest_purpose.description: Intended use: fresh_consumption, preservation, medicinal, seeds

error_messages: Invalid date format: Use ISO 8601 date-time format
Empty maturity indicators: Provide at least one maturity indicator
Invalid weather forecast range: Days must be between 1 and 14
Invalid harvest purpose: Use one of [fresh_consumption, preservation, medicinal, seeds]
Species not supported: The specified species is not in the optimization database
usage: Input the species name, current date, observed maturity indicators, and harvest purpose. The tool recommends optimal harvest dates considering quality and weather factors.

optimal_harvest_date.description: Recommended harvest date in YYYY-MM-DD format

urgency_level.description: Harvest urgency: low, moderate, high, critical
